name: Brutal Brutalness
description:
Find the missing band members in a relentless world of darkness and death. Blast your way through 30 levels of evilness, killing, fighting and looting while the soundtrack grinds away with brutal Metal music.

Use the loot you collect during the journey to buy upgrades at the Metal camp. Kill all enemies and collect all loot to max out every level.

Following the legacy of the previous Metal games "Die For Metal", and "Die For Metal Again", this game explores the combination of pixel art games from the 80s with extreme music, and Metal aesthetics.

Enjoy!

* 30 Levels
* Big evil bosses
* explosions everywhere
* Great soundtrack
* Flame, blood and everything cool

Novembers Doom is contributing on the soundtrack! Need I say more?
